attributes.action: reduce the age to claim working tax credit to 23 .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At present you can only claim if you are under 25 by having a disability or have a child . 

i have worked since i left school , and at 23 am struggling to make ends meet even though in full time work . i have no children and cannot afford the costs of living. also most people are in same situation my age and we are entitled to no help at all ... how unfair
